welcome_message_body: Welcome to Abbotsford, Canada, where you'll find a perfect blend of rural charm and urban amenities. Enjoy our picturesque landscapes, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community as you explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abbotsford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Abbotsford Airport is used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bellingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chilliwack Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chilliwack Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
